attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please DO keep Windsor Fire station open 24/7 . It is essencial to make sure the historical town under full protection. There are many eldly people living in this area.They are immobile if their house are on fire . It is also unfair to shut the night firestation service in one place in order to save another place 's budget. People's life are equally important.
